mil3.3.8:1.2: “bhante nāgasena, yattha manoviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, phassopi vedanāpi tattha uppajjatī”ti?
mil3.3.8:1.3: “Āma, mahārāja, yattha manoviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, phassopi tattha uppajjati, vedanāpi tattha uppajjati, saññāpi tattha uppajjati, cetanāpi tattha uppajjati, vitakkopi tattha uppajjati, vicāropi tattha uppajjati, sabbepi phassappamukhā dhammā tattha uppajjantī”ti.
mil3.3.8:3.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve meṇḍā yujjheyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko meṇḍo, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:3.3: Yathā dutiyo meṇḍo, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:3.4: Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:4.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve pāṇī vajjeyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko pāṇi, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:4.3: Yathā dutiyo pāṇi, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:4.4: Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve sammā vajjeyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko sammo, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:5.3: Yathā dutiyo sammo, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:5.4: Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
